text2: PETSLIVE aims to provide care and beauty for your pet. Here you will find several services where you can choose the one your pet prefers and needs.
text3: We have several pet cleaning and care services, go and choose the one that interests you and the one that your pet needs.
text4: Here you can find information in case your pet needs medical care. You can also search for us and contact us virtually as our physical points.
text5: In this section you can create a profile as a pet owner to have a type of identification and also keep track of some services that your pet has had.
text7: We are a dedicated company whose objective is to help the owners' pets with health and beautification issues. We have professionals in all the services we offer. We also have a section for people interested in adopting and making happy a pet they want. home.
text10: We have the hairdressing service where we will do the cut that the owners want, a bathroom where we will properly clean the pet, pet care for pets that need it, all this for the value of 55,000 pesos, if the owner wants a home it would have a value of 60,000 pesos.
text12: We have a canine hotel service where we know that from time to time pet owners need someone to take care of their pet, we offer this service where we will properly care for your pet, this service has a cost of 15,000 pesos 24 hours, depending on the time. If they need it, they would have to talk to someone on staff.
text14: We have a veterinary service for pets where we have health professionals, we have virtual communication methods and local positions for your attention. This service has free revision and the cost of medications or procedures will depend on the situation.
text16: About our pet clinic and interest in adopting
text17: In our clinic you will find several professionals to care for your pets, we have the best quality equipment, the examination of any pet is free to obtain a diagnosis and depending on the occasion, additional measures such as medications or any surgery or intervention for your health will have a price.
text18: The information at the bottom of the page is for people interested in adopting a pet, making it happy and giving it a good home.
text38: The name can only contain letters

text47: The phone can only contain numbers
